ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Attack speedups
ygData.msgSnippet: since the info came out about the haste cap i don t remember the last time SLW was cast by our enchanters.  it is always augmentation, as every tank we have
ygData.messageBody:
since the info came out about the haste cap i don't remember the last time
SLW was cast by our enchanters. it is always augmentation, as every tank we
have has a haste item. SLW will get any player to the haste cap regardless
of items, therefore with any items it seems to be a waste. i did hear
however that the haste cap was bumped up on the test server in expectation
of kunark. we're guessing it is probably around 100% now instead of 60%.

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L49 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server

>
> Hmmm, our enchanters will swift our tanks and yes they all have haste
> equipment of some sort (FBSS, Planes belts, etc.) It's our
> SOP to SLTW on
> tanks at the end of the buffing. This is for Dragons and
> Gods. Also for
> general work in the planes our tanks beg for swift. I am not
> sure abou the
> cap on a weapon speed nor what it takes to reach the cap. We
> buff SLTW
> religiously.
